00033 #include "chipstream/AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel.h"
00034 //

00040 
00041 bool AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::doFeatureSelection(std::set<probeid_t> &goodIds, std::vector<double> &confVals,
00042                                                    Matrix &PM, std::vector<probeid_t> &probeIds, const char *psName) {
00043   Matrix aicData;
00044   aicData = PM;
00045   if(m_DoRatio) {
00046     SpectClust::rowMedianDivide(PM);
00047   }
00048   PM = PM.t();
00049   if(m_DoLog) {
00050     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::log2Matrix(PM);
00051   }
00052   DistanceMetric *metric = NULL;
00053   if(m_Metric == AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::Angle) {
00054     metric = new AngleMetric(PM);
00055   }
00056   else if(m_Metric == AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::Corr) {
00057     metric = new CorrelationMetric();
00058   }
00059   else if(m_Metric == AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::GaussianRadial) {
00060     metric = new GuassianRadial(m_Sigma);
00061   }
00062   else {
00063     Err::errAbort("Don't recognized metric of type: " + ToStr(m_Metric));
00064   }
00065   SymmetricMatrix D;
00066   Matrix EVec;
00067 
00068   std::vector<double> eVals;
00069   std::vector<int> clusters;
00070   SpectClust::fillInDistance(D, PM, *metric, false);
00071   delete metric;
00072   if(m_NormDist) {
00073     SpectClust::normalizeSum(D);
00074   }
00075   bool converged = false;
00076   if(m_FullEigen) {
00077     converged = SpectClust::findNLargestSymEvals(D, 2, eVals,EVec);
00078   }
00079   else {
00080     converged = SpectClust::findNLargestEvals(D, 2, eVals, EVec, m_MaxEigIterations);
00081   }
00082   if(m_ProbeWeights.is_open()) {
00083     for(int i = 0; i < probeIds.size(); i++) {
00084       m_ProbeWeights << psName << "\t" << probeIds[i] << "\t" << EVec.element(i,1) << endl;
00085     }
00086   }
00087   SpectClust::partitionClusters(D, EVec, eVals, 2, clusters, m_HardMinimum, m_Partition, m_Margin);
00088   SpectClust::orderIntraClusterCorr(PM, clusters, 2, confVals);
00089 
00090   // if we're doing filtering on information criteria then calculate the confidence values.
00091   if(m_InfoFilter != AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::NoFilter) {
00092     vector<double> aicVals, bicVals;
00093     SpectClust::AICcRmaMedianCluster(aicData, 2, clusters, aicVals, bicVals, true);
00094     if(m_InfoFilter == AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::BIC)
00095       confVals = bicVals;
00096     else if(m_InfoFilter == AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::AIC)
00097       confVals = aicVals;
00098     else
00099       Err::errAbort("AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::doFeatureSelection() - Don't recognize info filter: '" + ToStr(m_InfoFilter) + "'");
00100   }
00101   //  SpectClust::AICc(aicData, 2, clusters, aicVals, confVals);
00102   for(int i = 0; i < probeIds.size(); i++) {
00103     if(clusters[i] == 1) {
00104       goodIds.insert(probeIds[i]);
00105     }
00106   }
00107   return converged;
00108 }
00109                                                  
00110 
00111 bool AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::fillInSelectProbes(ProbeSetGroup &selectGroup, std::vector<ChipStream *> &cStream, 
00112                                                  IntensityMart &iMart, ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, std::vector<double> &confVals) {
00113   int chipCount = iMart.getCelFileCount();
00114   int atomPmCount = psGroup.countPmProbes();
00115   int newAtomPmCount = atomPmCount;
00116   bool success = true;
00117   if(atomPmCount <= m_HardMinimum) {
00118     success = false;
00119   }
00120   else {
00121     vector<bool> probesToUse(atomPmCount, false);
00122     vector<probeid_t> probeIds(atomPmCount, -1); // Probe ids in order as they are in psGroup
00123     set<probeid_t> goodIds;
00124     Matrix PM(atomPmCount, chipCount); // rows are probes, columns are chips
00125     ///@todo need to use correct channel for multi channel expression probesets
00126     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::fillInPmData(PM, probeIds, psGroup, cStream, iMart, false);
00127 
00128     string tempName;
00129     tempName = psGroup.name;
00130     doFeatureSelection(goodIds, confVals, PM, probeIds, tempName.c_str());
00131     int minPossibleProbes = max(m_HardMinimum, (int)(atomPmCount * m_HardProportion));
00132     int maxPossibleProbes = (int)(atomPmCount * m_HardMaxProportion);
00133     bool infoGood = true;
00134     if(confVals[0] <= confVals[1] && m_InfoFilter != AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::NoFilter) {
00135       infoGood = false;
00136       success = false;
00137     }
00138     if(minPossibleProbes >= goodIds.size() || goodIds.size() >= maxPossibleProbes) {
00139       fill(confVals.begin(), confVals.end(), 0);
00140       success = false;
00141     }
00142     else {
00143       AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::makeSelectProbesetGroup(selectGroup, goodIds, psGroup);
00144       newAtomPmCount = selectGroup.countPmProbes();
00145     }
00146   }
00147   return success;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /** 
00151  * Do the analysis for a particular group of probe sets.
00152  * 
00153  * @param psGroup - Collection of probe sets to get probes from.
00154  * @param layout - How probes/probesets are laid out on chip.
00155  * @param iMart - Object containing raw data values for all chips.
00156  * @param doReport - Should the quantification report object be called?
00157  * @param alleleSummaryOnly - this is a parameter that makes sense in the base class AnalysisStream::doAnalysis, but not here.  Included here only to make the inheritance work.  Feel free to ignore.
00158  * 
00159  * @return true if success, false otherwise.
00160  */
00161 bool AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::doAnalysis(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00162                                            IntensityMart &iMart, 
00163                                            bool doReport,
00164                                            bool alleleSummaryOnly) {
00165   if(m_Debug && !m_AllProbes.is_open()) {
00166     /// @todo use TsvFile
00167     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_AllProbes, Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".spect-select.data.txt"));
00168     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_UsedProbes,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".spect-select.useddata.txt"));
00169     m_AllProbes << "probeset\tprobe";
00170     m_UsedProbes << "probeset\tprobe";
00171 
00172     std::vector<std::string> celFiles = iMart.getCelFileNames();
00173     for(int i = 0; i < celFiles.size(); i++) {
00174       m_AllProbes << "\t" << celFiles[i];
00175       m_UsedProbes << "\t" << celFiles[i];
00176     }
00177     m_AllProbes << endl;
00178     m_UsedProbes << endl;
00179 
00180     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_ProbeWeights,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".spect-select.weights.txt"));
00181     m_ProbeWeights << "probeset\tprobe\tweight" << endl;
00182   }
00183   if(!m_Log.is_open()) {
00184     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(m_Log,Fs::join(m_OutPrefix,getName() + ".spect-select.report.txt"));
00185     /// @todo Use TsvFile
00186     m_Log << "probeset_id\ttotal\tused\tclust1_info\tclust2_info\torig_probes\tused_probes" << endl;
00187   }
00188   bool success = true;
00189   ProbeSetGroup psSelectGroup, *toUse = NULL;
00190   vector<double> confVals;
00191   confVals.push_back(0);
00192   confVals.push_back(0);
00193   if(fillInSelectProbes(psSelectGroup, m_CStreams, iMart, psGroup, confVals)) {
00194     toUse = &psSelectGroup;
00195   }
00196   else {
00197     toUse = &psGroup;
00198   }
00199   if(m_Log.is_open()) {
00200     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbesUsed(m_Log, *toUse, psGroup, confVals);
00201   }
00202   if(m_AllProbes.is_open()) {
00203     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbeLevelData(m_AllProbes, psGroup, iMart, m_CStreams);
00204     AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::reportProbeLevelData(m_UsedProbes, *toUse, iMart, m_CStreams);
00205   }
00206   if(m_QMethod->setUp(*toUse, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust)) {
00207     m_QMethod->computeEstimate();
00208     if(doReport) {
00209       for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00210         m_Reporters[i]->report(*toUse, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00211       }
00212     }
00213   }
00214   else {
00215     Verbose::out(5, "Warning setup failed for name: " + ToStr(toUse->name));
00216     success = false;
00217   }
00218   if(!success && doReport) {
00219     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_Reporters.size(); i++) {
00220       m_Reporters[i]->reportFailure(*toUse, *m_QMethod, iMart, m_CStreams, *m_PmAdjust);
00221     }
00222   }
00223   return success;
00224 }
